00012 Table* table_create(int initialSize)
00013 {
00014     Table* table = (Table*) malloc(sizeof(Table));
00015     if (table == NULL)
00016     {
00017         return NULL;
00018     }
00019 
00020     table->keys = (char**) calloc(initialSize, sizeof(char*));
00021     table->values = (void**) calloc(initialSize, sizeof(void*));
00022 
00023     if ((table->keys == NULL) || (table->values == NULL))
00024     {
00025         return NULL;
00026     }
00027 
00028     table->size = initialSize;
00029     table->count = 0;
00030 
00031     return table;
00032 }

00034 static int table_extend(Table* table)
00035 {
00036     // increase table size 2 times
00037     int newSize = table->size << 1;
00038     table->keys = (char**) realloc(table->keys, newSize * sizeof(char*));
00039     table->values = (void**) realloc(table->values, newSize * sizeof(void*));
00040     if ((table->keys == NULL) || (table->values == NULL))
00041     {
00042         return -1;
00043     }
00044 
00045     // initialize new allocated space
00046     int i;
00047     for (i = table->size; i < newSize; i++)
00048     {
00049         table->keys[i] = NULL;
00050     }
00051 
00052     table->size = newSize;
00053 
00054     return 0;
00055 }

00057 int table_put(Table* table, const char* key, void* value)
00058 {
00059     if (table->count == table->size)
00060     {
00061         int error = table_extend(table);
00062         if (error != 0)
00063         {
00064             return error;
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068     // search for the free slot
00069     int id;
00070     char** keys = table->keys;
00071     for (id = 0; keys[id] != NULL; id++)
00072         ;
00073 
00074     //copy key
00075     keys[id] = (char*) malloc(strlen(key) + 1);
00076     if (keys[id] == NULL)
00077     {
00078         return -1;
00079     }
00080     strcpy(keys[id], key);
00081     // copy value
00082     table->values[id] = value;
00083 
00084     table->count++;
00085 
00086     return 0;
00087 }

00089 void* table_get(Table* table, const char* key)
00090 {
00091     int i;
00092     char** keys = table->keys;
00093     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++)
00094     {
00095         if ((keys[i] != NULL) && (strcmp(keys[i], key) == 0))
00096         {
00097             return table->values[i];
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     // nothing is found
00102     return NULL;
00103 }

00105 int table_remove(Table* table, const char* key)
00106 {
00107     int i;
00108     char** keys = table->keys;
00109     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++)
00110     {
00111         if ((keys[i] != NULL) && (strcmp(keys[i], key) == 0))
00112         {
00113                 free(keys[i]);
00114             keys[i] = NULL;
00115             table->count--;
00116             return 0;
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120     // nothing is found
00121     return -1;
00122 }

00124 void table_free(Table* table)
00125 {
00126     int i;
00127     char** keys = table->keys;
00128     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++)
00129     {
00130         if (keys[i] != NULL)
00131         {
00132             free(keys[i]);
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     free(keys);
00137     free(table->values);
00138 
00139     free(table);
00140 }
